name: Active Synergy
desc: Unit is activating the synergy ability of an ally nearby.

name: SILENCED
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: POISONED
desc: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

name: BLINDED
desc:
Unit's accuracy and avoid greatly decreases.
HIT -50. AVOID - 50.

name: CONFUSED
desc: Unit behaves on their own and can't tell friend or foe.

name: SLEEPING
desc: Unit is asleep. -5 DEF and RES. Unit awakes when receives a hit.

name: STUNNED
desc: Unit cannot act for the remainder of their turn.

name: Exposed
desc: Unit is more likely to receive critical hits. Can be stacked.

name: Blinded Immunity
desc: Unit cannot be <red>[BLINDED]</>.

name: Heroic Blow
desc:
The Chosen can use a powerful attack. Effective against monsters.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Assault
desc:
The Chosen can unleash an all-powerful attack around it, damaging nearby enemies.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Aura
desc:
When at less than full health, the Chosen can call upon Ivala to heal their wounds.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Ivala's Blessing
desc: Unit gains extra EXP.

name: Aura Blighting
desc:
The Chosen heavily benefits from adjacent female units, gaining bonus combat stats and a chance to gain <green>[CONCEITED]</> at the start of the turn. The women, however, are debuffed with <red>[REPULSED]</>.
<green>[CONCEITED]</>: Bonus CRIT. Lasts for one combat.
<red>[REPULSED]</>: -2 to all stats as long as he is nearby.

name: Aura Blighting
components: any(['Female' in u.tags for u in target_system.get_adj_units(game.get_unit('Chosen'))])

name: Conceited
desc:
"I have to show them how awesome I am!"
Bonus CRIT. Lasts for one combat.

name: Repulsed
desc:
If only he was as torelable as he is powerful.
-2 to all stats.

name: Safe Approach
desc: <green>[Simon Synergy]</> The Chosen has begrudgingly decided to hear Simon's advice for once. Unit has bonus damage when defending.

name: Safe Approach
desc: <green>[Simon Synergy]</> The Chosen has begrudgingly decided to hear Simon's advice for once. Unit has bonus damage when defending.

name: Strategic Strikes
desc: Simon can use a plethora of special strikes that cause negative effects on his enemy.

name: Blinding Strike
desc:
Simon can use Blinding Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BLINDED]</>: Unit loses HIT and AVOID. Duration: 2 turns.

name: Silencing Strike
desc:
Simon can use Silencing Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>SILENCE</>: Unit cannot use magic items. Duration: 3 turns.

name: Stunning Strike
desc:
Simon can use Stunning Strike. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>STUN</>: Unit cannot act. Duration: 1 turn.

name: Rebuke
desc:
Cures negative status effects from a nearby ally.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Shelter
desc: Unit can rescue an adjacent ally. When paired-up, gain bonus DEF and RES.

name: Shelter
desc: Unit can rescue an adjacent ally. When paired-up, gain bonus DEF and RES.

name: Heroic Imitation
desc:
<green>[Chosen Synergy]</> Simon can attempt to copy the Chosen's power.
Effective against monsters. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Heroic Imitation
desc:
<green>[Chosen Synergy]</> Simon can attempt to copy the Chosen's power.
Effective against monsters. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Aptitude
desc: Unit has higher growths.

name: Revenge Driven
desc: While at less than half of MAX HP, Mira can double attack on defense.

name: Premature Advance
desc: Mira has her eyes set on a dangerous future. Mira has extra movement. This skill is deactivated upon first receiving damage on the current chapter.

name: Overbearing Jokes
desc: <green>[Duro Synergy]</> Mira can't stand Duro's jokes! Mira can move after attacking.

name: Overbearing Jokes
desc: <green>[Duro Synergy]</> Mira can't stand Duro's jokes! Mira can move after attacking.

name: Like a champ
desc: Doubles Duro's defense. Has DEF% chance of activating when defending a strike.

name: Like a champ
desc: Doubles Duro's defense. Has DEF% chance of activating when defending a strike.

name: Bear hug
desc: Duro locks adjacent enemies into a hot, sweaty bear hug. Neither Duro nor adjacent enemies can dodge attacks.

name: Bear hug
desc: Unit is receiving a hot bear hug from behind. AVOID is negated.

name: Grand Entrance
desc: When Duro is at full HP, his attacks hit enemies in an area. Costs <blue>4 mana</>.

name: Remembrance
desc: <green>[Lucia Synergy]</>. Lucia reminds Duro of his wife's fierceness. Duro recovers 30% max HP at the start of the turn.

name: Puppy Eyes
desc: While at full HP, Monica is more likely to avoid enemy attacks.

name: Awkward Silence
desc: Monica has MAG% at the beginning of the turn to gain the Awkward Silence aura. Enemies affected by this aura gain [SILENCED].

name: Awkward Silence (ACTIVE)
desc: Enemies nearby cannot use magic while this aura is active.

name: Soothing Presence
desc:
Monica's presence might not be heard, but is definitely felt. Monica can heal an ally from far away.
Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Penitence
desc:
When at more than half health, Monica can use Penitence: Heals in an area. Allies gain <red>[BLESSED]</>. Costs <red>HP equal to half of MAX HP</> and <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[BLESSED]</>: Unit takes half damage in the next combat.

name: Blessed
desc: Unit feels the touch of someone inside them... in a wholesome way. Takes half damage. Lasts for one combat.
components: Lost after combat with an ally
Lost after combat with an enemy
Lost after combat if using an AOE item

name: Inspiring Ambition
desc: <green>[Mira Synergy]</> Inspired by Mira's ambition, Monica has greater MAG.

name: Flashy Strike beta
desc: Antarion can use his special attack <green>Flashy Strike</>. It most certainly defeats any enemy with one strike.

name: Drink Potion
desc: While at less than full life, Antarion can drink one of his many potions. One use per chapter.

name: Attention Is All You Need
desc: <green>[Milena Synergy]</>. Nothing makes Antarion happier than the gaze of a beautiful lady. Antarion heals adjacent allies 50% of damage dealt.

name: Flashy Strike
desc: Each combat initiated by Antarion builds 1 charge. Defeating a foe builds 2 charges. At 4 charges, Antarion can use this skill for a guaranteed critical attack.

name: Critical Boost
desc: Antarion gaints +10 CRIT. After a critical attack, he gains <red>[OVERCONFIDENCE]</>: +15 HIT, -15 AVOID. Lasts until end of next combat.

name: Overconfidence
desc: Antarion is too focused on his own success. HIT+15, AVOID-15. Lasts until end of next combat.

name: Clutch King
desc: Antarion gains more crit damage the less health he has.

name: Survival First
desc: While at less than half of max HP, Antarion has bonus AVOID and MOV.

name: Twice the Threat
desc:
If Lucia is in Guard Stance with Cassian,
Cassian will always attack first.

name: Twice the Threat
desc: Heals half of damage dealt.

name: No Privacy
desc: On <red>odd</> turns, Cassian can move next to Lucia, regardless of MOV or where she is on the map.

name: Burning Advance
desc: <green>[Rosa Synergy]</>. Rosa kindly sets Cassian's weapons ablaze. Cassian has HIT% chance to inflict <red>[BURNED]</> on his attacks.

name: Defiant Strike
desc: For the first 3 combats this chapter, Cassian has incrased defense when attacking.

name: Exposing Crash
desc:
Cassian has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when hitting an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Twice the Threat
desc:
If Cassian is in Guard Stance with Lucia,
Lucia heals half of damage dealt.

name: Twice the Threat
desc: Always attacks first.

name: No Privacy
desc: On <red>even</> turns, Lucia can move next to Cassian, regardless of MOV or where he is on the map.

name: Striking Defiance
desc: For the first 3 combats this chapter, Lucia has incrased damage when defending.

name: Exposing Guard
desc:
Lucia has a chance to inflict <red>[EXPOSED]</> when hit by an enemy.
<red>[EXPOSED]</>: Unit is more likely to receive critical attacks. Can be stacked.

name: Make Way
desc: <green>[Safado Synergy]</>. Safado accidentaly teaches Lucia how to push people away. Lucia can use Make Way, which damages and pushes opponents. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.

name: Webbed
desc: Unit has -5 SPD and -3 MOV for the remainder of their turn.

name: Flashy Escape
desc:
<green>[Antarion Synergy]</>. While painful to admit, Safado learns from Antarion's swordskills. Swaps user with the target, also applying <red>[BLINDED]</>.
<red>[BLINDED]</>:Unit's accuracy and avoid greatly decreases.
HIT -50. AVOID - 50.

name: Stalling Stance
desc:
Safado can grant himself the Stalling Stance status. When active, neither Safado nor their enemies will land their attacks.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Stalling_Stance
desc: Safado will dodge enemy attacks, but also miss his own.

name: Nothing Personal
desc:
Safado can pivot to the other side of the enemy, when possible. After that, his next attack on this turn inflicts <red>[POISONED]</>. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.
<red>[POISONED]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.

name: Nothing Personal buff
desc:
Safado's next attack will inflict <red>[POISONED]</>.
<red>[POISONED]</>: Unit randomly receives up to 5 damage per turn.
components: Lost after combat with an ally
Lost after combat with an enemy
Lost after combat if using an AOE item

name: Sneaking Stance buff
desc:
Safado can gain <green>[SNEAKING STANCE]</>. Costs <blue>10 mana</>.
<green>[SNEAKING STANCE]</>: Safado can pass through enemy units and has bonus MOV.
Buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: Sneaking Stance buff
desc:
Safado can pass through enemy units and has bonus MOV.
Buff is lost when Safado attacks someone.

name: Firewall
desc:
Rosa ignites fire at an empty tile. Units standing on it get <red>[BURNED]</>. Lasts 3 turns. Cooldown: 3 turns. Costs <blue>5 mana</>.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start and end of unit's turn.

name: Cozy Warmth
desc: While Rosa is standing on a <red>Firewall</> and equipping <red>Fire</> magic, +2 to all stats and CRIT greatly increased.

name: Burned
desc: Unit is receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn.

name: Burned (Firewall)
desc: Unit is receives 5 damage at the start and end of the turn, as long as they are on <red>Firewall</>.

name: Hot Business
desc:
When using a <red>Fire</> spell, Rosa has MAG% chance to inflict <red>[BURNED]</> on her enemy.
<red>[BURNED]</>: 5 damage at the start and end of unit's turn.

name: Fast Fire
desc: <green>[Cassjan Synergy]</>. Rosa learned with Cassian that, sometimes, it's better to act quick and think later. Rosa has increased attack speed.

name: Tarrying Pyre
desc: This is Rosa's last moment.

name: Post Nut Prayer
desc:
<green>[Monica Synergy]</>. Minerve learned from Monica the relaxing effect of spiritual pursuit. When dancing, also grants the ally <red>[PNP]</>.
<red>[PNP]</>: Unit has +15 HIT and AVOID. Lasts 2 turns.

name: PNP
desc: Unit has +15 HIT and AVOID. Lasts 2 turns.

name: Rock Throw
desc: ORC THROW BIG ROCK!

name: Last Stand
desc: When at less than half of max HP, unit will not be affected by any negative status.

name: Sword Breaker
desc:
Unit is buffed if enemy is using a <red>Sword</>.
DMG+10, HIT+30, DMG received -5.

name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Flying
desc: Can fly.

name: Strength +2
desc: Grants STR +2.

name: Strength +5
desc: Grants STR +5.

name: Resistance +5
desc: Grants RES +5.

name: Defense +5
desc: Grants DEF +5.

name: Speed +5
desc: Grants SPD +5.

name: Skill +5
desc: Grants SKL +5.

name: Luck +5
desc: Grants LCK +5.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can open locks without a key.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 Critical change

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 Critical change

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Devil Luck
desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.
Receives damage equal to damage dealt.

name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.

name: Wagon mode
desc:
Bonus to movement in detriment to other stats.
Megail and adjacent units gain access to the <green>Convoy</>.

name: Aura of Might
desc:
<red>STR+5, DEF+5.</>
<blue>MAG-5, RES-5.</>

name: Aura of Spirit
desc:
<blue>MAG+5, RES+5.</>
<red>STR-5, DEF-5.</>

name: Shield of Purity
desc: Increases allies' DEF and RES for 2 turns. Range: 2 tiles. Cost: 5 mana.

name: Offensive Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Offensive Rain</>, which debuffs the opponent's defensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Defensive Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Defensive Rain</>, which debuffs the opponent's offensive stats.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Blinding Rain
desc:
Vhala can use <red>Blinding Rain</>, which can inflict <red>[Blinded]</> onto the targets.
Costs <blue>10 mana</>.

name: Defense Debuff
desc:
From Vhala's <red>Offensive Rain</>.
DEF -3. RES - 3.

name: Attack Debuff
desc:
From Vhala's <red>Defensive Rain</>.
STR -3. MAG - 3.

name: Defender's Frenzy
components: any([u.nid == 'Varia' for u in target_system.get_adj_units(game.get_unit('Hilstara'))]) and not 'Defenders_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills] and not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Defender's Frenzy
components: not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Servant's Frenzy
components: not 'Defenders_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills] and not 'Servants_Frenzy_effect' in [skill.nid for skill in unit.skills]

name: Disrupt
desc: Attempts to inflict various status effects on an enemy. ✩5
